Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful

Class JFileSelectionDialog

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful.JFileSelectionDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Localizer.LocaleChangeListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JFileSelectionDialog
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Localizer.LocaleChangeListener

Standard file selection dialog (see JFileChooser). Main differences from (see JFileChooser) are:

  • This class supports any FileSystemInterface available, not only local disks
  • This class is localized and will change all locale-specific information on locale changes

Differ to JFileChooser, this class is a child of the JPanel and can be embedded into any Swing forms as the part of them. To use it as ordinal dialog window, call it's static methods select(Dialog, Localizer, FileSystemInterface, int, FilterCallback...) and select(Frame, Localizer, FileSystemInterface, int, FilterCallback...).

This class is not thread-safe

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
JFileChooser, FileSystemInterface, Localizer, Serialized Form

    • JFileSelectionDialog

      public JFileSelectionDialog​(Localizer localizer) throws LocalizationException

      Constructor of the class

      Parameters:
      localizer - localizer to use with the class. Can't be null. It's strongly recommended to use PureLibSettings.PURELIB_LOCALIZER localizer to call the constructor

      Throws:
      LocalizationException - in any localization errors
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

      Constructor of the class

      Parameters:
      localizer - localizer to use with the class. Can't be null. It's strongly recommended to use PureLibSettings.PURELIB_LOCALIZER localizer to call the constructor

      logger - logger to print errors into. Can't be null. Toy can use this parameter to build total log with the rest of your application

      LocalizationException - in any localization errors

  • Method Details

    • localeChanged

      public void localeChanged​(java.util.Locale oldLocale, java.util.Locale newLocale) throws LocalizationException
      Description copied from interface: Localizer.LocaleChangeListener

      Process changing if the current locale. Call after any locale changing

      Specified by:
      localeChanged in interface Localizer.LocaleChangeListener
      Parameters:
      oldLocale - old locale before changing. Can't be null
      newLocale - new locale after changing. Can't be null
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - if any localization problems were detected

    • select

      public void select​(FileSystemInterface node, int options, AcceptAndCancelCallback<JFileSelectionDialog> callback, JFileSelectionDialog.FilterCallback... filters) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Select file(s) or directory(ies) from the current file system

      Parameters:
      node - filesystem to select from. Can't be null. Selection always begins from the current file system point. If user press 'accept', current file system point is committed, else remains unchanged.
      options - options to select (see class constants). All the constants you need must be ORed with '|'
      callback - process pressing of the 'accept' and 'cancel' buttons. Can't be null.
      filters - file filters.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if options contains incompatible flags

    • getSelection

      public java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getSelection()

      Get selected list. Can be called for pressing 'accept' only, otherwise returned content is unpredictable

      Returns:
      selected content. Can be empty, but not null

    • select

      public static java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> select​(java.awt.Dialog window, Localizer localizer, FileSystemInterface node, int options, JFileSelectionDialog.FilterCallback... filter) throws java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Show modal dialog to select files and return selected list

      Parameters:
      window - parent window to use. Can be null
      localizer - localizer to use (see JFileSelectionDialog(Localizer)
      node - file system to select file from (see select(FileSystemInterface, int, AcceptAndCancelCallback, FilterCallback...)
      options - options to select
      filter - file filter
      Returns:
      selected files. If the 'cancel' was pressed, will be empty
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      LocalizationException - on any localization errors

    • select

      public static java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> select​(java.awt.Frame window, Localizer localizer, FileSystemInterface node, int options, JFileSelectionDialog.FilterCallback... filter) throws java.io.IOException, LocalizationException

      Show modal dialog to select files and return selected list

      Parameters:
      window - parent window to use. Can be null
      localizer - localizer to use (see JFileSelectionDialog(Localizer)
      node - file system to select file from (see select(FileSystemInterface, int, AcceptAndCancelCallback, FilterCallback...)
      options - options to select
      filter - file filter
      Returns:
      selected files. If the 'cancel' was pressed, will be empty
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      LocalizationException - on any localization errors
